head.supplied: 24./3/82 ¶ ¶ I am not acquainted with the fung, just received from you, dear Mr Ramsay but will send it to a specialist in Europe for naming, if indeed it is more than a mere mycelium of an undevelop...

div.p: ML MSS.562, Letters to E. P. Ramsay 1862-91, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

I am not acquainted with the fung, just received from you, dear Mr Ramsay but will send it to a specialist in Europe for naming, if indeed it is more than a mere mycelium of an undeveloped fung. If I should not always write at once, when you send me kindly anything, then remember, that I am no longer young & strong like you; but this I would say, that whatever you may send, will be duely turned to scientific account.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
